feed.title: glazeruns TikTok
feed.subtitle: OK Boomer, all the latest TikToks from glazeruns

entry.title: Before 250 miles and After 250 miles Never lost the smile. But what I gained is priceless. Cocodona 250 will teach you things about yourself that are hard to put into words. The lessons gained out in the mountains will help you later in life. LFG Smile,
entry.content: Before 250 miles and After 250 miles Never lost the smile. But what I gained is priceless. Cocodona 250 will teach you things about yourself that are hard to put into words. The lessons gained out in the mountains will help you later in life. LFG Smile,

entry.title: The amount of times I've shit while running is way too high. Almost didn't make it. Smile, or you're doing it wrong. #ultramarathon #ultrarunning #ultrarunner
entry.content: The amount of times I've shit while running is way too high. Almost didn't make it. Smile, or you're doing it wrong. #ultramarathon #ultrarunning #ultrarunner

entry.title: I am humbled and excited to share that I have been offered the position of Battalion Chief, starting at the end of June. This role was something my Dad and I often discussed before he passed, and it feels deeply meaningful to reach this milestone. Two yea
entry.content: I am humbled and excited to share that I have been offered the position of Battalion Chief, starting at the end of June. This role was something my Dad and I often discussed before he passed, and it feels deeply meaningful to reach this milestone. Two yea

entry.title: Two 100 milers in a week. what could go wrong #ultrarunner #runtok #bighorn100 #sandiego100

entry.title: The knees are strong. Smile, or you're doing it wrong. #runtok #ultrarunner #firefighter

entry.title: Keep failing forward. Two years ago, I worked hard for a promotion and did not get it. Even worse, I failed the test. I took a day to be sad about it. Then, I worked hard to prepare for the next test. More classes, more symposiums, more studying, more eve
entry.content: Keep failing forward. Two years ago, I worked hard for a promotion and did not get it. Even worse, I failed the test. I took a day to be sad about it. Then, I worked hard to prepare for the next test. More classes, more symposiums, more studying, more eve

entry.title: Pulled off the win although I had to really work for it. 100 miles/161 km does not come easily. Especially when the race starts at 6pm. Born to Run 100 miler was an incredible experience and I will be back. #runtok #ultramarathon #ultrarunner #borntorun
entry.content: Pulled off the win although I had to really work for it. 100 miles/161 km does not come easily. Especially when the race starts at 6pm. Born to Run 100 miler was an incredible experience and I will be back. #runtok #ultramarathon #ultrarunner #borntorun
